Instance.description: Situation for the pet adoption officer and the pets selected for adoption.

TunableTuple.name: adoption_officer_job_and_role
TunableTuple.description: The job and role state for the pet adoption officer.

Tunable.name: role_state
Tunable.description: A role state the sim assigned to the job will perform

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that can be performed at this Situation.

TunableTuple.name: has_front_door_arrival_state
TunableTuple.description: The arrival state for the adoption officer if the lot has a front door.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: has_no_front_door_arrival_state
TunableTuple.display: 1. Has No Front Door Arrival State
TunableTuple.description: The arrival state for the adoption officer if the lot does not have a front door.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: leave_state
TunableTuple.description: The state for the adoption officer to leave.

TunableTuple.name: pet_adoption_candidate_job_and_role
TunableTuple.display: Pet Adoption Candidate Job And Role
TunableTuple.description: The job and role state for the pets that are adoption candidates.

Tunable.name: role_state
Tunable.description: A role state the sim assigned to the job will perform

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that can be performed at this Situation.

Tunable.name: pet_crate_object_definition
Tunable.description: Object definition of the pet crate object that will be created as part of this situation.

TunableEnum.name: pet_crate_tag
TunableEnum.description: Tag used to find the pet crate object.

TunableTuple.name: pick_up_adoption_crate_state
TunableTuple.description: The state for the adoption officer to pick up the adoption crate.

Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableTuple.name: spawn_pets_state
TunableTuple.description: The state in which adoption candidate pets are spawned.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

Tunable.name: spawn_offset
Tunable.description: The offset from the center of the crate in the forward direction that is used as the starting location to fgl for pets to spawn.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: wait_for_pets_to_despawn_state
TunableTuple.display: 4. Wait For Pets To Despawn State
TunableTuple.description: The state where any adoption candidate pets that were not adopted are despawned.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.
